law.catch_line: Before a reciprocal license expires, the licensee periodically may renew it for an additional term, ...

text.section:
Before a reciprocal license expires, the licensee periodically may renew it for an additional term, if the licensee:
otherwise is entitled to be licensed;
pays a renewal fee to:
the State Board as required under this title; or
the local jurisdiction from which the reciprocal license is sought; and
meets any other requirement for renewal set by:
the State Board; or
the local jurisdiction from which the reciprocal license is sought.
A reciprocal license issued to an individual who has failed to renew the license may not be reinstated.
A reciprocal license issued under this subtitle is not transferable.
